(-3.680341102081108E-13 + 2.1846947794280886E-11*i), (-3.9243124854183976E-13 + 2.3375965471784554E-11*i), (-4.179427531893061E-13 + 2.5000034392372307E-11*i) )
// A = [ 2 <= x <= 20 <> 0.1 ]  ( GAMMA ( 0.5 + i*x ) )
!! G (n) = A#n

// scaled value for plot
!! F (n) = s * G(n)

// RI plot of values by section
plotri F  [ 160 <= k < LENGTH A ]

// difference between algorithm and Anaconda MPMATH.gamma
!! dif (n) = F(n) - s * Gamma (0.5 +!* ( 2+0.1*n ) )

// RI plot of differences
plotri dif  [ 0 <= i < LENGTH A ]
